Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Columbus in 1969...
Injured on 7/11/1970 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/1971, off Mickey Meenan (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/29/1971, off Gerald Skipper (NE)...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Malibu on 9/1/1975...
Injured on 5/30/1977 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Northeastern on 8/23/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1981, hitting .421 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 2/3/1983 to a 2-year deal worth $410,700 per year...
Released by New Jersey on 4/21/1983...
